title: Hailey Bieber stuns in Vera Wang wedding dress in new reception photos
text:

After getting hitched for the second time in late September, new photos have emerged of Justin and Hailey Bieber's wedding reception.

In the black and white snaps, the 22 year-old model rocks a custom Vera Wang dress, simple and chic in style.

The gown had a classy side parting, out of which Hailey revealed a toned leg.

Tying back her blond locks, she completed the ensemble with a pair of trainers, and later heels.

Pop star Justin wore a classic tux, and danced the night away without a jacket.

They said their vows at the Montage Palmetto Bluff Hotel n South Carolina, in front of a star-studded guest list of 154 friends and family.

It was the second time they got married, and went all out with the celebrations - they'd already tied the not in a New York City Courthouse in 2018.

Guests included the Jenner sisters, Kylie and Kendall, alongside Justin's fellow musicians Ed Sheeran , Usher and Katy Perry.

Hailey's Hollywood royalty family were also there - her dad, Stephen, as well as uncle Alec.

(Image: Instagram)

The pair first met at a Justin fan event in 2009, when Stephen introduced the Sorry singer to his 12 year-old daughter Hailey.

After an on-off relationship, they reconnected in summer last year and in July, Justin got down on one knee.

On 9th July 2018, Justin and Hailey confirmed their enagagement.

At the time, a smitten Justin wrote: "Was gonna wait a while to say anything but word travels fast, listen plain and simple Hailey I am soooo in love with everything about you!

"So committed to spending my life getting to know every single part of you loving you patiently and kindly. I promise to lead our family with honour and integrity letting Jesus through his Holy Spirit guide us in everything we do and every decision we make."
description: The newlyweds looked the picture of elegance, Hailey wowing guests with a custom Vera Wang dress
